transforms.code:
import colorsys
	colors = []
	gr = 0.61803398875
	hue = 1.0
	
	for i in range(20):
		rgb = colorsys.hsv_to_rgb(hue, 0.90, 0.95)
		colors.append({'color': "rgba(%i,%i,%i,1)" %(rgb[0] * 255, rgb[1] * 255, rgb[2] * 255), 'pen': None})
		hue += gr
	return colors

config.script:
if not self.view.custom.realtime:
		selectionEnd = self.view.custom.selectionEnd if isinstance(self.view.custom.selectionEnd, long) else self.view.custom.selectionEnd.getTime()
		selectionStart = self.view.custom.selectionStart if isinstance(self.view.custom.selectionStart, long) else self.view.custom.selectionStart.getTime()
		difference = selectionEnd - selectionStart
		self.view.custom.selectionStart = selectionStart - difference
		self.view.custom.selectionEnd = selectionEnd - difference

config.script:
if not self.view.custom.realtime:
		selectionEnd = self.view.custom.selectionEnd if isinstance(self.view.custom.selectionEnd, long) else self.view.custom.selectionEnd.getTime()
		selectionStart = self.view.custom.selectionStart if isinstance(self.view.custom.selectionStart, long) else self.view.custom.selectionStart.getTime()
		endPicker = self.view.custom.endPicker if isinstance(self.view.custom.endPicker, long) else self.view.custom.endPicker.getTime()
		difference = selectionEnd - selectionStart
		self.view.custom.selectionEnd = endPicker
		self.view.custom.selectionStart = endPicker - difference

transforms.code: return 'visible' if value == self.props.text else 'hidden'

config.script:
if event.column == 'delete':
		pen = self.view.custom.pens[event.row]
		system.perspective.sendMessage('toggleTagHistory', {'path': pen['path']})

	else:
		self.view.custom.pens[event.row][event.column] = event.value

messageHandlers.script:
axisName = payload['axis']
		
	axes = [axis for axis in self.view.custom.axes]
	axisToRemove = None
	for axis in axes:
		if axis['name'] == axisName:
			axisToRemove = axis 
	axes.remove(axisToRemove)
	self.view.custom.axes = axes

if 'rowIndex' in payload and \
	  payload['rowIndex'] >= 0 and \
	  payload['rowIndex'] < len(self.view.custom.pens):
		self.view.custom.pens[payload['rowIndex']].color = payload['color']
		for color in self.view.custom.colors:
			if color.pen == self.view.custom.pens[payload['rowIndex']].path:
				color.pen = None
				break
